But it wasn‘t.....one of the most frustrating situations....

review_data.title: Nice place to eat at lunch.

review_data.title: Nice restaurant in Zürich West

review_data.title: Excellent service, close to office in the west Zurich
review_data.content: Normally I visit here for afterwork, team get-together etc. Very friendly staff, courteous, they remember our choices and tastes.

review_data.title: Great bar/restaurant
review_data.content: Another of my favorites due to proximity to our hotel. Great staff, good food, and excellent bar. Decent happy hour M-F from 5 p.m. to 6 p.m., with 1/2 price wine, beer, and sparkling wine.

review_data.title: Great place, food took its time

review_data.title: Night out

review_data.title: Stylish & tasty
review_data.content: Aubrey's motto is Drink Dine Dance. I can't comment on the dance part but if you look for a place to drink and dine in Zurich West Aubrey is a good and stylish choice. I can recommend the Aubrey burger.

review_data.title: Better than the mainstream

review_data.title: Small but nice!

review_data.title: Nice first evening meal

review_data.title: Delicious lunchtime steak

review_data.title: Enjoyable dinner
review_data.content: Perfect Christmas dinner. Nice and smiley service, very good quality food (specially the meat). Price ok, within Zürich standards. It was my first time here, surely not the last!

review_data.title: Eine Top-Eventlocation!!

review_data.title: Great service and good food

review_data.title: Cute place, good food, nice atmosphere

review_data.title: Mehr drink als dine

review_data.title: An Island in a urban place
review_data.content: Aubrey offers a good mix between friendliness and an excellent place to be. It is an outstanding bar/restaurant, where you can choose between a few but very well cooked dishes and enjoying the atmosphere of a stylish and urban place with superb service.
